com.ibm.ecm.api.coresdk.collection

Class IBMECMChoiceList

  • Object
    • IBMECMChoiceList

  • public class IBMECMChoiceList
extends Object
    Represents a choice list defined for a property. A choice list contains a name property and a set of choices for users to select from.

    A choice list can also be hierarchical and contain other choice lists.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IBMECMChoiceList(String displayName)
      Constructs an instance of an IBMECMChoiceList.

    • Constructor Detail

      • IBMECMChoiceList

        public IBMECMChoiceList(String displayName)
        Constructs an instance of an IBMECMChoiceList.
        Parameters:
        displayName - the name for this choice list

    • Method Detail

      • getDisplayName

        public String getDisplayName()
        Returns the display name for this choice list.
        Returns:
        the display name for this choice list

      • getChoiceItems

        public List<IBMECMChoiceItem> getChoiceItems()
        Returns a list of IBMECMChoiceItem items for this choice list.

        This call will only return choice items if this is a non-hierarchical choice list.

        Returns:
        a list of IBMECMChoiceItem items for this choice list

      • getChoiceLists

        public List<IBMECMChoiceList> getChoiceLists()
        Returns a list of IBMECMChoiceList items for this choice list.

        This call will only return choice lists if this is a hierarchical choice list.

        Returns:
        a list of IBMECMChoiceList items for this choice list

      • setChoiceLists

        public void setChoiceLists(List<IBMECMChoiceList> choiceLists)
        Sets the list of IBMECMChoiceList items for this choice list. This means this is now a hierarchical choice list. A hierarchical choice list does not have choices and will return null if getChoiceItems() is called.
        Parameters:
        choiceLists - the choice lists to set for this choice list

      • setChoiceItems

        public void setChoiceItems(List<IBMECMChoiceItem> choices)
        Sets the choices items for this choice list. You can only set choice items if this is not a hierarchical choice list.
        Parameters:
        choices - the choice items to set for this choice list

      • isHierarchicalChoiceList

        public boolean isHierarchicalChoiceList()
        Returns whether this is a hierarchical choice list. A hierarchical choice list means it contains other choice lists.
        Returns:
        true if this is a hierarchical choice list
